short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your todos directly from Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No Complex PM, no multiple lists, No states, etc...
Just one todo list, one done todo list. 
Simple. 

Download New Tab Todo Manager. Best new tab extension for Chrome that only focusses the important todo's.
